content: #CATENA_Network#CMCX_CoinAnyone interested in testing the Deja Vu testnet can receive some test CMCX by sharing their wallet address on the official CORE MultiChain Telegram group (https://t.me/coremultichaingroup). The Deja Vu testnet is the official testnet for the CORE MultiChain ecosystem, and gives developers and teams worldwide access to the Web3 technology of the future, with built-in privacy and interoperability! ======================================To add the CORE MultiChain’s Deja-Vu TestNet network to your wallets, please follow the below steps:Metamask Wallet users:1. Go to the Explorer's website (https://dejavu-testnet.coremultichain.com);2. Open the sidebar menu (top right of the page);3. Click on “Add" button.*You can also enter the network configuration details manually to your Metamask wallet, using the following information:Network Name: CORE Multichain Deja vu TestNetNew RPC URL:https://testnet-rpc.coremultichain.netChain ID:2122Currency symbol:CMCXBlock explorer URL:https://dejavu-testnet.coremultichain.com======================================#CMCX#CORE#COREMULTICHAIN
